Tavatron returned the smile, glad to see that he had a sense of humor after 
all. Though she still needed a weapon, Tav decided that her optic lasers, 
sword, and energon staff were enough, for now.

Tavatron took the rifle from Dinobot and weighed it carefully in her hand. 
She didn't like the feel of anything that didn't require close combat. This 
rifle included. Tavatron had been trained in melee combat and strategic 
planning. When it came to target practice she was at a loss. Tavatron handed 
it back to Dinobot:

"Not bad. It's a good weapon. A little too heavy for my taste, but not bad."
